8. Use a VPN: Use a virtual private network (VPN) when using public Wi-Fi to encrypt your internet traffic and protect your personal information.
9. Monitor your credit report: Check your credit report regularly to detect any suspicious activity.
10. Stay informed: Stay informed about the latest scams and threats by visiting websites such as the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) or the Identity Theft Resource Center.
